questions_and_answers.question: What is the major focus of the B.Tech. program in Robotics and Artificial Intelligence?
questions_and_answers.answer: The major focus of the program is to generate skilled personnel required for the implementation of Industry 4.0 technologies in the industry. For further details please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-robotics.php

questions_and_answers.question: What is the percentage of Robotics and Artificial Intelligence related courses in the program?
questions_and_answers.answer: The program presents equal percentage of Robotics and Artificial Intelligence related courses. For further details please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-robotics.php

questions_and_answers.question: What are the Robotics related courses offered in the program?
questions_and_answers.answer: Robotics related courses include the courses on design and manufacturing of the robot, sensing, control, programming, and applications of robots. For further details please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-robotics.php

questions_and_answers.question: What are the Artificial Intelligence related courses offered in the program?
questions_and_answers.answer: Courses related to Artificial Intelligence include basics of Programming, Machine Learning, Big Data Analytics, Deep Learning, and IT and Communication Systems. For further details please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-robotics.php

questions_and_answers.question: What is the vision of the Robotics and Artificial Intelligence (AI) program?
questions_and_answers.answer: The vision of the program is to produce engineers of the highest quality who are professionally competent and highly qualified to suit the needs of industries and organizations by promoting excellence in teaching, learning, and research. For further details please visit https://nmamit.nitte.edu.in/department-robotics.php

questions_and_answers.answer: The mission of the department is to provide high quality education to students, to fulfill the requirements of a ‘Global Engineer’, constantly strive to improve the teaching-learning methods, respond to the fast evolving scientific and technological challenges in a highly competitive world, and inculcate ethics, integrity, honesty, credibility, social and environmental consciousness. questions_and_answers.question: What are Mr. Prasad Prabhu's educational qualifications?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. Prasad Prabhu is currently pursuing a Ph.D. under VTU, Belagavi, on the topic entitled “Investigations on piezo actuator-based workpiece feeding and vibratory system for vibration-assisted micro milling.” He completed his MTech in Machine Design from NMAMIT, Nitte, in 2016, and his B.E in Mechanical Engineering from Shri Devi Institute of Technology, Kenjar, Mangalore, in 2012 under Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU).

questions_and_answers.question: What is Mr. Prasad Prabhu's past experience?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. Prasad Prabhu worked as a Research Associate in the Department of Robotics and Artificial Intelligence Engineering at NMAMIT, Nitte, from 2021 to 2023. Prior to this, he worked as a Research Scholar in the Department of Mechanical Engineering at NMAMIT, Nitte, from 2017 to 2020. He also has experience as an Assistant Engineer at Bharathi Shipyard Ltd., Mangalore, from 2012 to 2014.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Mr. Prasad Prabhu's areas of interest?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. Prasad Prabhu's areas of interest include Robotics, Artificial Intelligence, Machine learning, Digital Manufacturing, Micro Manufacturing, Programming, Internet of Things, Mechatronics, and Control.

questions_and_answers.question: What achievement does Mr. Prasad Prabhu have?
questions_and_answers.answer: The M.Tech. Project entitled “Design, Fabrication and Testing of Tool Feeding system for In-situ Tool grinding in micro EDM” has been awarded “FIRST PRIZE” in non-circuit stream of M.Tech. Project Competition “I2 CONECCT” organized by IEEE Mangalore Sub-Section, held at Canara Engineering College, Mangalore, on 14th May 2016. The research work entitled “Design & development of a Low-Cost 4-Axis CNC Machine for Artwork Machining” has been judged as the “First Consolation Prize” among the Institutions who participated in Academia-Industry Pavilion at International Machine Tool Exhibition -2023 (IMTEX-2023).

questions_and_answers.question: What subjects has Mr. Prasad Prabhu handled?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. Prasad Prabhu has handled subjects including Introduction to Robotics Laboratory, Motion Control using PLC Laboratory, and Active Learning on Robotics.

questions_and_answers.question: What conferences/CME/Workshops has Mr. Prasad Prabhu participated in?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. Prasad Prabhu has participated in ABB Robot IRB-1600 Hands on training, Robot Studio software training, Five-day workshop on PLC based Programming and Automation, Five-day Faculty development Program on FESTO-Advanced Pneumatics for Automation, Training on interfacing servo drive with PLC, Five days Faculty development Program on PYTHON for Numerical Simulation and applied artificial Intelligence for Mechanical Engineering, and Five-day hands-on training on FESTO-Basic Hydraulics for Automation. He has also completed a Certification Course on “Model Simulate and control a drone in MATLAB & Simulink” from Udemy.

questions_and_answers.question: What conference/journal publications does Mr. Prasad Prabhu have?
questions_and_answers.answer:
Mr. Prasad Prabhu has publications including: 
1. Investigations on Piezo actuated Micro XY Stage for Vibration-Assisted Micro Milling, Journal of Micromechanics and Microengineering, Volume 31 Issue 6, 2021. 
2. Design, fabrication, and testing of flexurally amplified piezo actuator, Materials Today: Proceedings, Volume 46, Part 19, 2021, pp- 9490-9497. 
3. Implementation of structurally pre-stressed piezo actuator based active vibration isolation system for micro milling, Materials Today: Proceedings, 2023. 
4. Method, System and Apparatus for Fabricating Differently Shaped Tool Electrodes for Micro Electrical Discharge Machining, Reference ID: 201741032033. 
5. Method and System for Measurement of Residual Stress by Drilling Deep Holes in a Weld-Joint, Reference ID: 201941002849.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Ms. Prathiksha Pai's educational qualifications?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. Prathiksha Pai completed her MTech in Computer Science and Engineering from NMAMIT, Nitte, in 2021, and her B.E in Computer Science and Engineering from Mangalore Institute of Technology & Engineering (MITE) under Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU) in 2019.

questions_and_answers.question: What is Ms. Prathiksha Pai's past experience?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. Prathiksha Pai worked as an Assistant Professor in the department of Computer Science & Engineering at Srinivas University, Mukka, from January to November 2022.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Ms. Prathiksha Pai's areas of interest?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. Prathiksha Pai's areas of interest include Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Big data analytics, and Internet Of Things.

questions_and_answers.question: What subjects has Ms. Prathiksha Pai handled?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. Prathiksha Pai has handled subjects including Python Programming, C Programming, and Artificial Intelligence.

questions_and_answers.question: What conferences/CME/Workshops has Ms. Prathiksha Pai participated in?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. Prathiksha Pai attended a two-day workshop on 'Augmented Reality & Virtual Reality' held at SUIET, Mukka, during 3rd & 4th June 2022. She also attended a 20-day webinar on AI Master Class organized by Andhra Pradesh State Skill Development Corporation (APSSDC) and Pantech Prolabs India Pvt, Ltd from October 5 to October 24, 2020.

questions_and_answers.question: How many projects has Ms. Prathiksha Pai guided?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. Prathiksha Pai has guided one B.E project.

questions_and_answers.question: What conference/journal publications does Ms. Prathiksha Pai have?
questions_and_answers.answer:
Ms. Prathiksha Pai has publications including: 
1. Early Detection of Pneumonia using Deep Learning Approach, In: Sk, A.A., Turki, T., Ghosh, T.K., Joardar, S., Barman, S. (eds) Artificial Intelligence. ISAI 2022. Communications in Computer and Information Science, vol 1695. Springer, 01 Jan 2023. 
2. Automatic Generation of Repeated Patient Information for Clinical notes, Journal of Shanghai Jiaotong University, Volume 17, Issue 11, Nov 2021.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Mr. Vincent Linish Dsouza's educational qualifications?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. Vincent Linish Dsouza is currently pursuing his Ph.D. He completed his M.Tech in Machine Design from Visvesvaraya Technological University in 2014 and his B.E. in Mechanical Engineering from NMAM Institute of Technology, Nitte, in 2012.

questions_and_answers.question: What is Mr. Vincent Linish Dsouza's past experience?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. Vincent Linish Dsouza completed an internship at L&T Heavy Engg. Division Powai, Mumbai, in 2012 for two months.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Mr. Vincent Linish Dsouza's areas of interest?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. Vincent Linish Dsouza's areas of interest include Micro and Nano Positioning, Flapping wing Micro Air vehicles, Finite element Analysis, and Mechatronics and control.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Mr. Vincent Linish Dsouza's departmental responsibilities?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. Vincent Linish Dsouza serves as a BOS member/Syllabus modification and Departmental coordinator for the virtual Lab.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Mr. Vincent Linish Dsouza's professional memberships?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. Vincent Linish Dsouza is a Life Member of the Indian Society for Technical Education (ISTE) and a Life Member of the Indian Welding Society (IWS).

questions_and_answers.question: What subjects has Mr. Vincent Linish Dsouza handled?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. Vincent Linish Dsouza has handled subjects including Design of machine elements I, Design of machine elements II, Mechanics of Materials, Finite Element Methods, and Control Engineering.

questions_and_answers.question: How many projects has Mr. Vincent Linish Dsouza guided?
questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. Vincent Linish Dsouza has guided 4 M.Tech projects.

questions_and_answers.question: What conference/journal publications does Mr. Vincent Linish Dsouza have?
questions_and_answers.answer:
Mr. Vincent Linish Dsouza has publications including: 
1. Investigation on Voltage-Displacement Characteristics of Stacked Piezoelectric Actuator Incorporating Bouc-Wen Hysteresis Model, in proceedings of International Conference on Emerging trends in Engineering organized by NMAM Institute of Technology, Nitte, during 15th-17th MAY 2014. 
2. Investigations on piezoactuator based active vibration isolation for tool-based micromachining applications, in Proceedings of National Symposium on Microsystem Technologies (NSMT-2015) held at National Institute of Technology Karnataka Surathkal from 9-10 January - 2015. 
3. Performance Analysis and Design Modification of Engine Power Control Cable Routing of Light Transport Aircraft, IJIRECET, volume 5, Special Issue 5, May 2016. 
4. Design and Analysis of Piezo-Actuated Flapping Mechanism for Micro Air Vehicles, 7th International Conference on Emerging Trends in Engineering (ICETE-2017), Special Issue of NMAMIT Annual Research journal, 2017. 
5. Implementation of trapezoidal velocity profile and cubic polynomial trajectories for piezoactuator based inchworm drive, 8th International Conference on Emerging Trends in Engineering (ICETE-2018), @ NMAMIT- Nitte 14th-15th May 2018.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Ms. Rajashree Nambiar P's educational qualifications?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. Rajashree Nambiar P completed her MTech in Digital Electronics and Communication from NMAMIT, Nitte, in 2014. She also holds a B.E. in Electronics and Communication Engineering from MITK, Nitte, in 2009 under Visvesvaraya Technological University (VTU).

questions_and_answers.question: What is Ms. Rajashree Nambiar P's past experience?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. Rajashree Nambiar P worked as a Senior Assistant Professor in the department of Electronics and Communication Engineering at SMVITM, Bantakal, from 2014 to 2023. She also worked as an Assistant Professor in the department of Electronics and Communication Engineering at SMVITM, Bantakal, from 2010 to 2012.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Ms. Rajashree Nambiar P's areas of interest?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. Rajashree Nambiar P's areas of interest include Field Theory, Signal and systems, Signal & image processing, Deep Learning, and Programming.

questions_and_answers.question: What achievements does Ms. Rajashree Nambiar P have?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. Rajashree Nambiar P filed a patent under Effective Memory utilization in Cloud Computing in 2022. She was awarded funding for the project guided 'Diary milk from now to next' from Karnataka State Council for Science and Technology (KSCST) in 2021. She also received an award fund from VTU for the project guided 'Object Recognition and Headlight System for Autonomous Vehicles' in 2019.

questions_and_answers.question: What subjects has Ms. Rajashree Nambiar P handled?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. Rajashree Nambiar P has handled subjects including Logic design, Basic Electronics, Python Programming, Control Engineering, C++ Programming, Field Theory, Signals and Systems, Basic Electricals, Digital Signal Processing, Microwave and Antenna, and Radar Engineering.

questions_and_answers.question: What conferences/CME/workshops has Ms. Rajashree Nambiar P attended?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. Rajashree Nambiar P attended various workshops including a 6 days' workshop on 'Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning and Deep Learning Applications at NMAMIT Nitte', FDP on 'Inculcating Universal Human Values in Technical Education' organized by AICTE, a workshop on Mentor Graphics at SMVITM Bantakal, and a training on Blockchain using Node.js by FINLAND LABS.

questions_and_answers.question: How many projects has Ms. Rajashree Nambiar P guided?
questions_and_answers.answer: Ms. Rajashree Nambiar P has guided 11 B.E. projects.

questions_and_answers.answer: Mr. Ranjith Bhat has guided 11 B.E. projects.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. Adarsh Rai's educational qualifications?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Adarsh Rai holds a Ph.D. from N.M.A.M. Institute of Technology, Nitte. He completed his M.Tech in Energy System Engineering from N.M.A.M. Institute of Technology, Nitte, in 2010, and also holds a B.E. in Mechanical Engineering from the same institute.

questions_and_answers.question: What is Dr. Adarsh Rai's past experience?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Adarsh Rai has 1 year of industry experience at Transweigh India Limited and has been teaching for 13 years at NMAM Institute of Technology, Nitte.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. Adarsh Rai's areas of interest?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Adarsh Rai's areas of interest include Optimization and Artificial Intelligence.

questions_and_answers.question: What achievements does Dr. Adarsh Rai have?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Adarsh Rai received the ISTE G.S.F.C. National Award for Best M.Tech. Thesis Award in Mechanical Engineering.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. Adarsh Rai's departmental responsibilities?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Adarsh Rai serves as the Sessional Coordinator.

questions_and_answers.question: What professional memberships does Dr. Adarsh Rai have?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Adarsh Rai is a member of the Society of Automotive Engineering (SAE).

questions_and_answers.question: What subjects has Dr. Adarsh Rai handled?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Adarsh Rai has handled subjects including Material Science and Metallurgy, Fluid Mechanics, Mechatronics, and Fluid Power Systems.

questions_and_answers.question: How many projects has Dr. Adarsh Rai guided?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Adarsh Rai has guided 3 M.Tech projects.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. Rashmi P Shetty's educational qualifications?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Rashmi P Shetty holds a Ph.D. from NITK, Surathkal, completed in 2019. She also holds an M.Tech in Energy Systems Engineering from N.M.A.M. Institute of Technology, Nitte (2010-2012), and a B.E. in Industrial & Production Engineering from the same institute (2000-2004).

questions_and_answers.question: What is Dr. Rashmi P Shetty's past experience?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Rashmi P Shetty worked as an Assistant Lecturer in I.T.K, Surathkal from 2006 to 2009 (3 years) and as a Lecturer in NMAM Institute of Technology, Nitte from 2009 to 2010 (1 year). Currently, she is working as an Assistant Professor Gd-III in NMAM Institute of Technology, Nitte.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. Rashmi P Shetty's areas of interest?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Rashmi P Shetty's areas of interest include Renewable energy and Artificial neural network.

questions_and_answers.question: What achievements does Dr. Rashmi P Shetty have?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Rashmi P Shetty secured a gold medal in MTech Energy Systems (2010-2012). She received the Best Paper Award for "Wind power optimization: A comparison of metaheuristic algorithms" at the International Conference on Advances in Manufacturing Materials and Energy Engineering, MITE, Moodbidri, in 2018. Additionally, she received the Best Student Project Award in 2019 for the project titled "Automatic waste segregator" by the Fluid Power Society of India and another Best Paper Award for "Wind power prediction and modeling: a comparison of feed forward neural networks" at the Global Conference on Advanced Smart & Sustainable Technologies in Engineering, MITE, Moodbidri, in 2020.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. Rashmi P Shetty's departmental responsibilities?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Rashmi P Shetty serves as the Placement Coordinator, Student Mentoring Coordinator, and Departmental Coordinator for IIC.

questions_and_answers.question: What professional memberships does Dr. Rashmi P Shetty have?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Rashmi P Shetty is a member of the Institute of Engineers (IEI).

questions_and_answers.question: What subjects has Dr. Rashmi P Shetty handled?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Rashmi P Shetty has handled subjects including Material Science and Metallurgy, Operations Research, Elements of Mechanical Engineering, Metrology and Measurements, Introduction to Machine Learning, and Operations Management and Entrepreneurship.

questions_and_answers.question: How many projects has Dr. Rashmi P Shetty guided?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Rashmi P Shetty has guided 11 B.E. projects and 4 M.Tech projects.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. Veeresha R. K.'s educational qualifications?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Veeresha R. K. holds a Ph.D. in Investigations on mechanical micromachining process with piezoactuated machining depth control and its application on MEMS device fabrication from NMAMIT Nitte, completed in 2020. He also holds an M.Tech in Design Engineering from J.N.N.C.E, Shivamogga, completed in 2010, and a B.E. in Mechanical Engineering from S.T.J.I.T, Ranebennur, completed in 2007.

questions_and_answers.question: What is Dr. Veeresha R. K.'s past experience?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Veeresha R. K. worked at As-Met Industries Pvt. Ltd in 2007-08. He then worked as a Lecturer at NMAMIT, Nitte from 2010 to 2011. Later, he served as an Assistant Professor GD-I from 2011 to 2016, Assistant Professor GD-II from 2016 to 2021, and Assistant Professor GD-III from 2021 to 2022. Currently, he is working as an Associate Professor at NMAMIT, Nitte since 2022.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. Veeresha R. K.'s areas of interest?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Veeresha R. K.'s areas of interest include Micromachining, Image Processing and Artificial Intelligence, Finite Element Methods, Automation and Control, Device Development, and Composite Materials Machining.

questions_and_answers.question: What achievements does Dr. Veeresha R. K. have?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Veeresha R. K. received the FIRST PRIZE at Academia Industry Pavilion at International Machine Tool Exhibition-2015 (IMTEX-2015) for his research work. He also received the FIRST CONSOLATION PRIZE at IMTEX-2017. Additionally, his Final Year project titled "Design and Fabrication of Agarbatti Counting and Packing Machine" won the second prize in EXPRO-2014 at NMAMIT, Nitte.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. Veeresha R. K.'s departmental responsibilities?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Veeresha R. K. has served as the Project Co-ordinator (2010-2014), Student Satellite (StudSat) coordinator (2012-till date), Assistant Warden for Boy's Hostel (2013-2015), Department NAAC Co-ordinator (2021), PG project coordinator for Machine Design (2013-2015), M-Tech Machine Design Co-ordinator (2020-till date), Department Fast Track Co-ordinator (2014-till date), and BoS and BOE Member for PG Machine Design.

questions_and_answers.question: What professional memberships does Dr. Veeresha R. K. have?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Veeresha R. K. is a member of the Indian Society for Technical Education (ISTE), Institute of Smart Structure and System (ISSS), and Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineering (IEEE).

questions_and_answers.question: What subjects has Dr. Veeresha R. K. handled?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Veeresha R. K. has handled subjects including Computer-Aided Machine Drawing, Design of Machine Element-I, Design of Machine Element-II, Finite Element Method, Industrial Air Craft Design, Composite Materials, Biomechanics, Elements of Mechanical Engineering, Design of Robotic Components, Micro Aerial Vehicle, Introduction to Mechanical Micromachining, Python for data science, Research Ethics, Cybersecurity and the Internet of Things, Introduction to Engineering Mechanics, Machine Design Part-I, Machine Learning for All, Machine Learning Foundation: A case Study Approach, and Introduction to Programming with MATLAB.

questions_and_answers.question: How many projects has Dr. Veeresha R. K. guided?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Veeresha R. K. has guided 30 B.E. projects and 13 M.Tech projects.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. Muralidhara's educational qualifications?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Muralidhara holds a Ph.D. in Micromachining from Indian Institute of Technology Madras (IITM), completed in 2010. He also holds an M.Tech in Advanced Manufacturing Engineering from NITK Surathkal, completed in 2001, and a B.E. in Mechanical Engineering from Mangalore University, completed in 1998.

questions_and_answers.question: What is Dr. Muralidhara's past experience?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Muralidhara served as a Lecturer in NMAM Institute of Technology from 08-09-1998 to 29-02-2004, Senior Lecturer from 01-03-2004 to 31-01-2009, Assistant Professor from 01-02-2009 to 31-05-2011, Associate Professor from 01-06-2011 to 28-02-2013, and Professor from 01-03-2013. Currently, he serves as a Professor and PG Coordinator since 04-07-2016.

questions_and_answers.question: What are Dr. Muralidhara's departmental responsibilities?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Muralidhara is responsible for the Center for Tool based Micromachining Research, Center for System Design, Fabrication and Testing, Center for Research on Active vibration isolation, Active Learning Laboratory on Robotics, and NMAMIT-FESTO Center for Automation Technologies.

questions_and_answers.question: What professional memberships does Dr. Muralidhara have?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Muralidhara is a member of the Indian Society for Technical Education (ISTE) and the Indian Welding Society (IWS).

questions_and_answers.question: What subjects has Dr. Muralidhara handled?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Muralidhara has handled subjects including Robotics & Automation, Mechatronics, Mechanical Vibration, CAD/CAM, Control system, Mechatronics System Design, and Design and Control of Robotic Manipulator.

questions_and_answers.question: How many M.Tech. projects has Dr. Muralidhara guided?
questions_and_answers.answer: Dr. Muralidhara has guided 22 M.Tech. projects.
